entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @narendramodi Sir Good Evening I appreciate your effort towards to overcome challenges COVID-19 and protect Indian people ,Regarding new initiative of 21days lockout ,me & our family have some concern on this decision and we believe ! you will consider our concern as our God father .
